Package org.apache.xmlgraphics.image

Classes, codecs and utilities for bitmap images.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GraphicsConstants  
    GraphicsUtil
    Set of utility methods for Graphics.

Package org.apache.xmlgraphics.image Description

Classes, codecs and utilities for bitmap images. Contains extensions to the java.awt.image package. This package provides convenient methods, some utility classes and image codec classes. These generally bypass broken methods in Java2D or provide tweaked implementations.
